title: Hello World
headline: VRtualis has entered the lobby
body: VRtualis has officialy started, and is ready to serve the NeosVR community as a large freelanceing and volenteer community! Talented Logix Wizards, Enviromental Artists, and Modeling Artists are ready to help new uers and veteran players alike, from learning how the game works to building the next big project, together VRtualis is here to help build the Metaverse of Tomorrow!

title: Paris Loft
headline: VRtualis' First "Metahome"
body: For any and all NeosVR players looking for a new Cloud Home to live your days in the metaverse in, look no further than our first official metahome, aiming to simulate what it would be like to live in the Urban streets of Paris.

title: Modern Metahome
headline: A VRtualis Metahome made with baked lighting!
body: For most worlds in NeosVR, Baked lighting is a dream to have, but for us at VRtualis, we have our methods of creating, performant, and beutiful Reflections, and Lightmap data that is NeosVR friendly.

title: Simple Living
headline: A VRtualis Metahome made with baked lighting! Again!
body: Yet another, smaller, metahome for NeosVR users to have as their cloud home to spawn in and have a chill place to hang out when the metaverse gets alittle to busy.
